scene_description_enriched: In a pastoral landscape, two shepherds tend to their flock of sheep, accompanied by a dog. One shepherd, kneeling, gestures upwards, while the other stands, holding a staff and looking towards the sky. Above them, an angel descends from a radiant sky, holding a banner with the inscription "Gloria in excelsis Deo et in terra pax hominibus bonae voluntatis." In the background, a town with a prominent tower and a fortified castle are visible by a body of water. The scene likely depicts the Annunciation to the Shepherds, a key event in the Nativity narrative.
